history.content: <md>I've been running a program in Ethiopia over the summer since 2011 called [AddisCoder](https://addiscoder.com/), teaching algorithms and intro CS to high school students. We're launching a new offshoot program this summer in Kingston, Jamaica. If you or anyone you know might be interested in TA'ng (it's 4 weeks in July), please direct them to [our online application](https://jamcoders.org.jm/#apply). Flight and lodging are paid. It's a collaboration with the University of the West Indies Mona, and [Chronixx](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chronixx) (the famous Jamaican reggae artist). The main requirements to be a TA are fluency in both Python and intro algorithms (like CS 170, but less advanced). Feel free to email me with questions; minilek@berkeley.edu.</md>
history.subject: Free trip to Jamaica to teach algorithms to high schoolers
